places.formattedAddress: 2484 N Landing Rd #113, Virginia Beach, VA 23456

text.text: People say this restaurant serves delicious whole fried snapper, crab cakes, and she crab soup. They highlight the attentive service, clean atmosphere, and creative cocktails. They also like the personalized menus for special occasions and the staff's attentiveness to children.

places.formattedAddress: 3809 Princess Anne Rd #123, Virginia Beach, VA 23456

text.text: People say this restaurant serves delicious scallops, calamari, and lamb, and offers a variety of tapas and seafood dishes. They highlight the reasonable prices, cozy and romantic vibe, and live music. They also like the friendly and attentive staff.

places.formattedAddress: 401 N Great Neck Rd #129, Virginia Beach, VA 23454

text.text: People say this Italian restaurant serves delicious chicken parmesan, pasta with salmon, and seafood omelets. They highlight the artful presentation of dishes, the fresh and plentiful seafood, and the well-seasoned food. They also like the relaxing atmosphere and friendly staff.

places.formattedAddress: 1479 General Booth Blvd, Virginia Beach, VA 23454

text.text:
People say this restaurant serves delicious oxtail, Caribbean pasta, and seafood dip. They also highlight the lively vibe, fun music, and friendly staff.

Other reviews mention the food can be overpriced.

places.formattedAddress: 455 S Lynnhaven Rd, Virginia Beach, VA 23452

text.text: People say this barbecue restaurant serves tender brisket, perfectly smoked ribs, and flavorful pulled pork. They highlight the generous portions, delicious sides like mac and cheese, and the friendly, welcoming staff. They also like the laid-back atmosphere and the good value.

places.formattedAddress: 2135 General Booth Blvd #132, Virginia Beach, VA 23454

text.text: People say this restaurant serves delicious food, including tuna nachos, burgers, and filet, with beautiful presentation. They highlight the fresh ingredients, flavorful dishes, and good prices. They also like the nice lighting, atmosphere, and friendly service.

places.formattedAddress: 2149 General Booth Blvd, Virginia Beach, VA 23454

text.text: People say this restaurant serves delicious fried pickles, ribs, and whiskey burgers. They highlight the great selection of beer, the reasonable prices, and the warm and inviting atmosphere. They also like the friendly and attentive service.

places.formattedAddress: 3333 Virginia Beach Blvd UNIT 17, Virginia Beach, VA 23452

displayName.text: Jimmy G's Chop House & Bistro Bar

text.text: People say this fine dining restaurant offers delicious food and drinks. They highlight the friendly and attentive staff, and the beautiful, relaxed atmosphere. They also like the great value of the happy hour plates.

places.formattedAddress: 1400 N Muddy Creek Rd, Virginia Beach, VA 23456

text.text:
People say this restaurant serves delicious seafood, including she crab soup, crab cakes, and mahi, as well as brisket and sweet potato biscuits. They also highlight the beautiful outdoor seating, fun atmosphere with live music, and attentive service.

Other reviews mention the food can be overcooked.

places.formattedAddress: 1250 Fordham Dr, Virginia Beach, VA 23464

displayName.text: Park Lane Tavern of VB Kempsville

text.text: People say this bar and grill serves delicious fish and chips, bread pudding, and corned beef and cabbage. They highlight the generous portions, tasty food, and good drinks, as well as the cozy and welcoming atmosphere. They also like the friendly and attentive staff.

places.formattedAddress: 4501 Main St, Virginia Beach, VA 23462

text.text:
People say this restaurant serves delicious chicken and waffles, biscuits with blueberry jam, and fried green tomatoes. They also highlight the warm and inviting atmosphere, and the attentive service.

Other reviews mention the food can be overcooked.

places.formattedAddress: 1925 Fisher Arch, Virginia Beach, VA 23456

text.text:
People say this restaurant offers fresh food, awesome drinks, and a variety of gifts, including plants. They also highlight the fun atmosphere with an arcade, playground, and outdoor seating, and the friendly service.

Other reviews mention the food can be mediocre.

places.formattedAddress: 616 Virginia Beach Blvd, Virginia Beach, VA 23451

text.text: People say this restaurant serves delicious biscuits, omelettes, and pancakes. They highlight the generous portions, reasonable prices, and convenient parking. They also like the friendly and efficient service.

places.formattedAddress: 4356 Holland Rd Suite 104, Virginia Beach, VA 23452
1253 Nimmo Pkwy Suite 117, Virginia Beach, VA 23456

text.text: People say this American restaurant serves delicious bacon-wrapped shrimp, wings, ribs, and pizza. They highlight the great food, good prices, and fun atmosphere. They also like the friendly and attentive staff.

places.formattedAddress: 5347 Lila Ln, Virginia Beach, VA 23464
2876 Virginia Beach Blvd, Virginia Beach, VA 23452

text.text: People say this Venezuelan restaurant offers a delicious buffet with many options, as well as a la carte dishes with generous portions. They highlight the welcoming and fun atmosphere, and the attentive and friendly staff. They also like the good drinks and reasonable prices.

places.formattedAddress: 941 Providence Square Shopping Center, Virginia Beach, VA 23464

text.text: People say this diner serves delicious pancakes, omelettes, burgers, and sandwiches, with generous portions of crispy bacon and homemade chips. They highlight the reasonable prices, the fast and friendly service, and the welcoming, family-oriented atmosphere. They also like the fresh-squeezed orange juice and mimosas.

places.formattedAddress: 701 Lynnhaven Pkwy #1046, Virginia Beach, VA 23452

text.text:
People say this restaurant offers a wide variety of appetizers, burgers, salads, and entrees, including gluten-free, vegetarian, and plant-based options. They also highlight the friendly and attentive staff, the unique cocktails, and the great beer selection.

Other reviews mention the food can be inconsistent.

places.formattedAddress: 508 Atlantic Ave, Virginia Beach, VA 23451

text.text:
People say this breakfast restaurant serves delicious Belgian waffles, French toast, and corned beef hash. They also highlight the convenient location near the beach, the friendly and attentive service, and the quick service.

Other reviews mention the food can be cold.
